name: app-integration-06
description: Partner app showcase with four-column grid featuring branded avatars, descriptions, and connect buttons for app partnerships

files.content:
import { ChevronRightIcon } from 'lucide-react' import { Avatar, AvatarFallback } from '@/components/ui/avatar' import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button' import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card' import { cn } from '@/lib/utils' type PartnerApp = { name: string description: string image: string bgColor: string link: string }[] const AppIntegration = ({ partnerApps }: { partnerApps: PartnerApp }) => { return (
{/* Header */}

App Integration

Browse our partner apps

Explore integrated apps that enhance productivity, streamline workflows, and simplify collaboration effortlessly.

{/* Apps */}
{partnerApps.map((app, index) => (
{app.name} {app.description}
))}
) } export default AppIntegration
